name: Anti-Seeding
author: ItsSkaiya
payload: function init(){$ui.register((ctx)=>{ctx.setInterval(async ()=>{try{const torrents=await ctx.torrentClient.getActiveTorrents();for(const torrent of torrents){if(torrent.status=="seeding"){ctx.toast.info("Finished downloading - "+torrent.name);await ctx.torrentClient.pauseTorrents([torrent.hash]);ctx.toast.info("Removed the torrent from torrent client.");}}}catch(error){console.error("Error getting torrents:",error)}}},1000);});}
